question: In which Indian state, the longest bridge was inaugurated and it was named after the late singer Bhupen Hazarika?
explanation: The longest bridge in the country got the first signpost with its name on Sunday, six months after Prime Minister Narendra Modichristened it after the late singer Bhupen Hazarika in Assam. The 9.15-km bridge across the Brahmaputra will connect Dhola with Sadiya in upper Assam.
